LanguageData.Apparel_Hardsuit.label: Blood Red Hardsuit
LanguageData.Apparel_Hardsuit.description: Blood red hardsuit often issued to elite syndicate strike operatives.
LanguageData.Apparel_SyndiHelmet.label: Blood Red Helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_SyndiHelmet.description: A blood red Syndicate helmet often worn together with the syndicate hardsuit by Syndicate strike teams.
